title: Miss Perú 1993
text:
1993 Designation.
Due to the restructuring that carried out the <a href="Miss%20Peru">Miss Peru</a> Organization, Déborah D'Souza Peixoto was appointed to represent <a href="Peru">Peru</a> in the <a href="Miss%20Universe%201993">Miss Universe 1993</a> pageant by Mr. Benjamin Kreimer (president of Miss Peru Org).
On May 1, D'Souza traveled to Mexico City, Mexico to compete in the <a href="Miss%20Universe%201993">Miss Universe 1993</a> pageant which was held on May 21. She reached the 11th position, with 8.937 as Average Preliminary Score.
Mónika Saez Grimm, Miss Peru Asia-Pacific 1992, was appointed to represent Peru in the <a href="Miss%20World%201993">Miss World 1993</a> pageant, but was difficult for her to find a sponsor and that she would NO longer be able to fund the trip to South Africa.
